hero.subtitle: Achieve absolute control over your digital territory. The first AI-driven platform protecting sovereign networks with NIST-approved Post-Quantum Cryptography.

solutions.title: The Sovereign Cloud Paradox
solutions.description: Data Residency is not Sovereignty. If your provider is subject to foreign jurisdiction, your data has no borders. We ensure true digital autonomy.

card1.title: Jurisdictional Immunity
card1.text: Automated geofencing ensures critical data never leaves your legal borders. We provide immunity from extraterritorial data requests (subpoenas) by design.

card2.title: Quantum-Ready
card2.text: RSA-2048 will be broken. Sent-Quant implements NIST-approved post-quantum cryptography (Kyber/Dilithium) to defeat "Store Now, Decrypt Later" threats.

card3.title: Quantitative Defense
card3.text: Move beyond "Red/Green" status. Our AI calculates specific risk probability percentages for every node in your hybrid environment.

case1.title: National Defense
case1.desc: Secure air-gapped communications and intelligence sharing.

case2.title: Central Banking & CBDC
case2.desc: Protect digital currency ledgers from quantum decryption attacks.

case3.title: Genomic Sovereignty
case3.desc: Ensure national genomic data databases remain within borders.

platform.title: The <1>Sent-Quant</1> Platform
platform.desc: Experience the dashboard that visualizes your digital sovereignty. Sent-Quant provides a unified view of data flows, compliance status, and quantum-threat levels across your entire infrastructure.

feat1.title: Real-Time Data Mapping:
feat1.text: Visualize exactly where your data resides physically.

feat2.title: Compliance Automation:
feat2.text: One-click audit reports for GDPR, HIPAA, and Local Sovereignty Laws.

feat3.title: Threat Heatmaps:
feat3.text: AI-generated quantitative risk scores for every network node.

comparison.title: THE SOVEREIGN ADVANTAGE
comparison.desc: Public hyperscalers act as "digital landlords," retaining ultimate control over your infrastructure. Sent-Quant empowers you to be the <1>sovereign owner</1> of your digital territory, backing it with military-grade quantum defense.

contact.title: READY TO DEPLOY?
contact.subtitle: Join the invitation-only pilot program for sovereign cloud defense. Credentials are issued pending manual verification.

security.title: Security & Compliance
security.subtitle: Transparency and rigor are the cornerstones of CyberQuant's sovereign architecture.
security.protocols_desc: Sent-Quant employs a multi-layered defense-in-depth strategy designed for the post-quantum era.

market_report.title: 2026 Market Landscape Report
market_report.subtitle: Sent-Quant and the Strategic Re-Architecting of Global Cybersecurity
market_report.intro: The global cybersecurity landscape in early 2026 is defined by a state of 'digital hyper-fragmentation,' where the collision of agentic AI and post-quantum threats demands a new sovereign architecture.
market_report.deep_dive_desc: Our deep-dive report includes detailed competitive benchmarks against Microsoft Sentinel, Splunk, and CrowdStrike, along with financial framework analysis using the Gordon-Loeb model.
market_report.section1_desc: The fragmenting of global networks has birthed 'Jurisdictional Bunkers'—regions like Switzerland and Singapore that offer immunity from extraterritorial data access.
market_report.section2_desc: Sent-Quant is the first platform to offer native surveillance for the Model Context Protocol (MCP), securing AI agent tool-calling against prompt injection and credential escalation.
market_report.section3_desc: With the acceleration of quantum decryption timelines, Sent-Quant implements FIPS 203, 204, and 205 (ML-KEM, ML-DSA) to protect against 'Harvest Now, Decrypt Later' strategies.
market_report.section4_desc: Disrupting the industry's consumption-based pricing, Sent-Quant offers a fixed Total Cost of Ownership model, resulting in up to 90% savings compared to legacy hyperscalers.
market_report.impact_desc: Enterprise security is shifting from a sunk cost to an operational predictability driver. CyberQuant's fixed TCO model eliminates 'cloud tax' and scaling penalties.
market_report.radar_desc: Sent-Quant outperforms legacy architectures in sovereign dimensions: Post-Quantum Resilience, AI-Native Surveillance, and Jurisdictional Isolation.
market_report.beehive_desc: A mesh of isolated jurisdictional bunkers (Singapore, Switzerland, Iceland) ensuring total immunity from extraterritorial data seizure.

full.section1_p: The global security paradigm has transitioned into an era defined by Sovereign Resilience. Enterprises and state actors are fundamentally re-architecting infrastructure to prioritize absolute jurisdictional immunity. Organizations that successfully unify identity, sovereign cloud, and post-quantum endpoints (Platformization) currently command valuation multiples exceeding 12x.
full.section1_quote: Strategic security is transitioning from a sunk operational cost to a primary driver of fiscal predictability, reducing TCO by up to 92%.
full.section2_p: State and enterprise security budgets in 2026 are increasingly compromised by "Variable Ingestion Penalties." Sent-Quant disrupts this volatility with a fixed-monthly fiscal model that decouples operational security costs from data volume surges.
full.section2_risks_item2: SVC unit depletion during search operations (Legacy SIEM)
full.section2_efficiency_item3: Sovereign Edge Processing (Zero Incurred Egress Fees)
full.section3_p: This analysis is anchored in the following 2026 global market benchmarks and formal economic frameworks:
full.section3_ef_p: The Gordon-Loeb Model (37% Rule): A mathematical framework for optimising security investments to protect information sets based on vulnerability and potential impact metrics.
full.section3_mb_p: The $10.5 Trillion Threat: Projected annual global cybercrime cost by 2026, necessitating a transition to sovereign architectural defense (Source: 2026 Market Audit).
full.section3_sg_p: Sovereign Cloud Proliferation: The $195.35 Billion surge in jurisdictional-first data residency requirements globally.
full.section4_p: The Sent-Quant architecture is defined as "PQC Native," mitigating the systemic "Store Now, Decrypt Later" (SNDL) risks through proactive cryptographic agility.
full.section4_item1: Autonomous Response Operations: Utilises Gemini-Native Neural Correlation to identify non-deterministic threats that bypass traditional rule-based logic.
full.section4_item2: Peer-to-Peer Intelligence: Sovereign clusters exchange encrypted metadata signatures exclusively, maintaining 100% regional data residency.
full.section5_defense_p: Facilitates Multi-Domain Operations with "Air-Gapped Sync" and Zero Trust Hubs for secure sensor-to-shooter data pipelines.
full.section5_banking_p: Mitigates SNDL risk for cross-border settlement. Implements proprietary "SWIFT PQC" and immutable audit log chains for high-value transactional integrity.

nodes.title: Jurisdictional Node Intelligence: {{type}}
nodes.desc: This node represents a high-integrity, isolated jurisdictional bunker. It is architecturally decoupled from extraterritorial legal reach (US CLOUD Act immunity).
nodes.residence_item: Local Data Residence: Primary hosting in {{type}} tier-4 sovereign data centers.
nodes.connectivity_item: Connectivity: Private satellite backhaul available for extreme air-gap requirements.
nodes.mesh_item: Peer-to-Peer Mesh: Cross-node intelligence sharing without data egress.
